marklogic.body: yeah, its childish for the west to make sure its citizens are safe and better Off. Â during the Cold war we put dictators into power who would fight communism. Â all of those dictators were a lesser evil than communist rule. Â today we have to mop up but compared to how it was pre 1991 (the world was a button click away from a nuclear winter) it is a MUCH safer world. Â i would rather we have iran and iraq and a few other dictators we can bomb than USSR which the west could never take on militarily without ending the world. Â its childish how myopic you are.
